sources.title: The UnMiracle | Full Movie | True Story | Stephen Baldwin | Kevin Sorbo
sources.description:
The UnMiracle - Inspired by true events, this tale of how a small town reacts to the accidental drug overdose of a popular high school girl is told through 7 interweaving storylines.
2017.  Stars: Stephen Baldwin, Amy Lyndon, Kevin Sorbo

metadata.Plot: A teenage girl's overdose at an unsupervised party sends ripples through those connected to her, with some experiencing the "unmiracle," that moment of understanding that one's been viewing life's hardships upside-down, as if God hates them.
metadata.Actors: Stephen Baldwin, Amy Lyndon, Kevin Sorbo
